tit.cmt: タイトルのため頭文字を大文字にしました。

sen.j: 京街道（きょうかいどう）とは、京都へ向かう街道の総称である。
sen.e: "Kyo kaido"indicates all the streets which go to Kyoto.
"Kyo kaido"indicates all the streets which go to Kyoto.
"Kyo kaido" indicates all the streets which go to Kyoto.

sen.j: 以下の街道が京街道として呼ばれた。
sen.e: The following streets were called "Kyo kaido."
The following streets were called "Kyo kaido."
The following streets were called "Kyo kaido."

sen.j: 大坂から京都へ向かう道。
sen.e: The street to Kyoto from Osaka.
The street to Kyoto from Osaka.
The street to Kyoto from Osaka.

sen.j: 大坂（京橋のちに高麗橋）から淀川左岸、淀を経て、鳥羽街道を通り京都へ至る道。
sen.e: The street which goes to Kyoto from Osaka (Kyobashi, later known as Koraibashi) by going through the left bank of Yodo-gawa River to Yodo and then through Toba kaido.
A street which runs to Kyoto from Osaka (Kyobashi, later known as Koraibashi) by going through the left bank of Yodo-gawa River to Yodo and then through Toba kaido.
A street which runs to Kyoto from Osaka (Kyobashi, later known as Koraibashi) by going through the left bank of the Yodo-gawa River to Yodo and then through Toba kaido.
sen.cmt: "Yodo-gawa River"→"the Yodo-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: または淀から淀川右岸の堤（淀堤）上の道を通り、伏見を経て、伏見街道あるいは竹田街道を通り京都へ至る道。
sen.e: Or the street which goes to Kyoto from Yodo by using the street created on the wall of the right bank of Yodo-gawa River to Fushimi and then going through Fushimi kaido or Takeda kaido.
Or the street which goes to Kyoto from Yodo using a street created on the wall of the right bank of Yodo-gawa River to Fushimi and then going through Fushimi kaido or Takeda kaido.
Or the street which goes to Kyoto from Yodo using a street created on the wall of the right bank of Yodo-gawa River to Fushimi and then going through Fushimi kaido or Takeda kaido.

sen.j: 大坂街道。
sen.e: Osaka kaido
Osaka kaido
Osaka kaido.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせピリオドを追加

sen.j: →京街道 (大坂街道)
sen.e: Kyo kaido (Osaka kaido)
Kyo kaido (Osaka kaido)
Kyo kaido (Osaka kaido)

sen.j: 丹波国、丹後国、但馬国から京都へ向かう道。
sen.e: The street which goes to Kyoto from Tanba Province, Tango Province and Tajima Province.
A street which goes to Kyoto from Tanba Province, Tango Province and Tajima Province.
A street which goes to Kyoto from Tanba Province, Tango Province and Tajima Province.

sen.j: 福知山から、園部をへて亀岡に達し、亀岡から老の坂を越えて京都へ至る道。
sen.e: The street which goes to Kyoto from Fukuchiyama, going through Sonobe to Kameoka and then going up the Oinosaka to Kyoto.
A street which goes to Kyoto from Fukuchiyama, going through Sonobe to Kameoka and then going up Oinosaka to Kyoto.
A street which goes to Kyoto from Fukuchiyama, going through Sonobe to Kameoka and then going up Oinosaka to Kyoto.

sen.j: →山陰街道
sen.e: Sanin kaido
Sanin kaido
Sanin kaido

sen.j: 舞鶴（田辺城）から、綾部を経て上記につながる道。
sen.e: The street which goes to the above areas from Maizuru (Tanabe-jo Castle) via Ayabe.
The street which goes above areas from Maizuru (Tanabe-jo Castle) via Ayabe.
The street which goes above areas from Maizuru (Tanabe-jo Castle) via Ayabe.

sen.j: 福知山で山陰街道につながる道。
sen.e: The street merges with Sanin kaido in Fukuchiyama.
The street merges with Sanin kaido in Fukuchiyama.
The street merges with Sanin kaido in Fukuchiyama.

sen.j: 但馬国・福知山間の道。
sen.e: The street between Tajima Province and Fukuchiyama.
The street between Tajima Province and Fukuchiyama.
The street between Tajima Province and Fukuchiyama.

sen.j: 但馬側では京街道と呼ばれた。
sen.e: It is called "Kyo kaido" in Tajima.
It is called "Kyo kaido" in Tajima.
It is called "Kyo kaido" in Tajima.

sen.j: 宮津・福知山間の道（普甲越）。
sen.e: The street between Miyazu and Fukuchiyama (Fukogoe).
The street between Miyazu and Fukuchiyama (Fukogoe).
The street between Miyazu and Fukuchiyama (Fukogoe).

sen.j: 宮津では京街道、福知山では宮津街道と呼ばれた。
sen.e: It is called "Kyo kaido" in Miyazu and "Miyazu kaido" in Fukuchiyama.
It is called "Kyo kaido" in Miyazu and "Miyazu kaido" in Fukuchiyama.
It is called "Kyo kaido" in Miyazu and "Miyazu kaido" in Fukuchiyama.

sen.j: 奈良から京都へ向かう道。
sen.e: The street to Kyoto from Nara.
The street to Kyoto from Nara.
The street to Kyoto from Nara.

sen.j: →奈良街道
sen.e: Nara kaido
Nara kaido
Nara kaido

sen.j: 若狭国から京都へ向かう道。
sen.e: The street which goes to Kyoto from Wakasa Province.
The street to Kyoto from Wakasa Province.
The street to Kyoto from Wakasa Province.

sen.j: 九里半越。
sen.e: Kurihangoe
Kurihangoe
Kurihangoe.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせピリオドを追加

sen.j: その他京都へ向かう道。
sen.e: The other street which goes to Kyoto.
An alternate street which goes to Kyoto.
An alternate street which goes to Kyoto.

sen.j: 姫路から播磨国の内陸部を経て丹波国の篠山へ向かう道（姫路街道）。
sen.e: The street runs Sasayama of Tanba Province via the inland of Harima Province from Himeji (Himeji kaido).
The street runs to Sasayama of Tanba Province via the inland of Harima Province from Himeji (Himeji kaido).
The street runs to Sasayama of Tanba Province via the inland of Harima Province from Himeji (Himeji kaido).

sen.j: 現在の国道372号が該当する。
sen.e: It comes under the current National Road 372.
Currently, the street falls under National Road 372.
Currently, the street falls under National Road 372.

sen.j: 篠山からは天引峠を越えて亀岡・京都へ至る。
sen.e: It goes Kameoka, Kyoto through Amabiki Pass from Sasayama.
It ends in Kameoka, Kyoto after passing through Amabiki Pass from Sasayama.
It ends in Kameoka, Kyoto after passing through Amabiki Pass from Sasayama.

sen.j: 智頭街道。
sen.e: Chizu kaido
Chizu kaido
Chizu kaido.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせピリオドを追加

sen.j: 参勤交代の道として用いられ、鳥取から大坂・京都への幹線道路であったことから上方街道、京街道と呼ばれた。
sen.e: It was used as a street for alternate attendance, and it was called Kamigata kaido and Kyo kaido because it was the trunk road from Tottori to Osaka and Kyoto.
Used as a street for alternate attendance, it was called Kamigata kaido and Kyo kaido because it was a primary road connecting Tottori to Osaka and Kyoto.
sen.cmt: Robert: "alternate attendance" meaning is unclear/ Edited for flow
sen.e: Used as a street for Sankinkotai (a system under which feudal lords in the Edo period were required to spend every other year in residence in Edo), it was called Kamigata kaido and Kyo kaido because it was a primary road connecting Tottori to Osaka and Kyoto.
sen.cmt: 「参勤交代」の意味が明確になるよう表記を修正

sen.j: 朝鮮人街道。
sen.e: Chosenjin Kaido
Chosenjin Kaido
Chosenjin kaido (Korean road)
sen.cmt: 他の表記と合わせkaidoの頭文字を小文字にし、補足を追加
